name: Don't Be Nick Cage
description:
What does it mean to be Nicholas Cage. A criminal? A spirit of Vengeance? A Vampire? Or an embodiment of searching for answers that are not there. Explore the the psyche and see if you have what it takes to not be Nick Cage.

Assets Used

Background - Free Horizontal Game Backgrounds (https://free-game-assets.itch.io/free-horizontal-game-backgrounds)

Song - Leoforos_Alexandras
